name: Run Away From Snakes
description:
Run Away From Snakes is an endless runner set in an ostrich cathedral. 

Play as Pumk, an edgy pumpkin girl and stay alive whilst whacking ostrich plinths for slimy points.

Beat the high-score!

Controls (can be changed in launcher):
 Movement- WASD / Arrow keys
 Whack - Left Shift / Right Click 
 Jump - Space / Left Click

Follow the web-comic: http://apsadventures.site/index.php/bailjape/

This game was created for a panel in the comic, you can play it there: http://apsadventures.site/index.php/bailjape/s-pumk-run-away-from-snakes/

Music by Lateralyst

Player Model by PolyStation 2
